plot: A young widow is tempted by a laborer on her farm, but she firmly believes that a widow should remain faithful to her deceased husband.
title: Yeojaga gogaeleul neomeuldae
plot_es: A young widow is tempted by a laborer on her farm, but she firmly believes that a widow should remain faithful to her deceased husband.
plot_en: A young widow is tempted by a laborer on her farm, but she firmly believes that a widow should remain faithful to her deceased husband.
